content.rendered:
A velvety smooth moisturiser that plumps and hydrates the skin leaving a glowing, dewy finish.

Infused with bioactive native extracts of Kakadu Plum, Banksia and Flame Tree providing naturally occurring Vitamin C and fortified with powerful antioxidants including CoEnzyme Q10, Kukui Nut, Rosehip and Pomegranate. Hand-blended with nurturing Damascan Rose and Carrot Seed extracts to improve the elasticity and firmness of ageing skin.

For normal to dry skin.

excerpt.rendered:
•  Antioxidant protection from free radicals
  •  Hydration and calming from soothing botanical emollients
  •  Suitable for ageing skin and may be used in conjunction with Age Defiance Collection
  •  Helps support the skin’s lipid bi-layer function
  •  Supports the skin Natural Moisturising Factor (NMF)
  •  Assists in the reduction of Transepidermal Water Loss (TEWL)
